pinyin: ming2 bu5 zheng4 yan2 bu5 shun4

definitions.ming2 bu5 zheng4 yan2 bu5 shun4: unjustified and undeserving of such description; identity or status is unverified, or inconsistent in detail; unworthy of the title (or name), or reputation; no valid reason as justification; words without weight; cf 名正言順|名正言顺;
